Last night had been strange. Whether it was something you ate or something you caught, you felt terrible. Sleep was the only thing you wanted right now, and within minutes, you were out like a light.
As you'd anticipated, your nap was short-lived; however, you didn't expect to be plummeting to the earth when you woke up. You wanted to scream, but for some odd reason, you felt no fear. You blacked out before hitting the surface.
"Get up, lazy!" said a high voice unsympathetically. "Just three more minutes, mom..." you groaned. "I won't wait another second!" the voice boomed. You felt yourself lifted off the ground at least a hundred feet up. When you reluctantly opened your eyelids, the sight before nearly knocked you out again.
"Finally! What's wrong with you, little man? Did you intend on sleeping forever? asked a gargantuan Pikachu. "You're a g-giant... P-Pikachu...!?" you managed to ask. "What are you going on about? I'm a perfectly average Pikachu. You're just really small! The name's Lexie, by the way."
Your mind was quickly flooded with questions. 'Am I dreaming?' 'How did I survive the fall?' As if telepathically, Lexie says, "Quite a fall you took! Lucky I was there to break the fall. "Am I dreaming," you ask. "I sure hope not!" she replies. "I feel bad about asking you this," you start, "but you're...nice, right? I mean, you're not gonna' eat me or anything, right?" Almost immediately, she replies, "Of course not, silly! No offense, but you don't look too appetizing." She giggled, and you smiled as well. "But since I saved your life and all, I was wondering if you could do me a really small favor...?" "Okay... What do you have in mind?"
"Well," she says, putting you down, her sitting down in front of you, "I've always wanted someone to massage my paws for me... There aren't a lot of other Pokémon here, and you're the first real friend I've ever made. We are friends, right?" "Of course," you kindly reply. "Then you wouldn't mind... rubbing them," she extends her massive paws in front of you,"would you?"
You stop and think for a bit. 'She is awfully cute and she's been very friendly so far... Not to mention, she saved my life... But those feet are massive! They could take hours to thoroughly rub! Plus, wouldn't it be strange if the first girl I'm ever... intimate with is a Pikachu?' A few seconds pass before your mind's made up. "Well," you start...

Silence followed her tale, and for a minute, you sat staring into her eyes, hoping she would show some sign of infidelity. But Veronica wasn't lying. She was genuinely upset, and you didn't have the heart to ignore her.

Rather than comfort her with empty words, you went right up to her and hugged her paw. She said nothing, but continued to lament even more. Finally she laid down on her back and placed you on her chest. "I'm sorry, honey... I didn't want to hurt you. I just wanted to bully someone around and you seemed like the perfect candidate. I'm ashamed to admit that I half-enjoyed it, too..." At this, you cringed slightly, but continued to embrace her. Veronica was not as soft as Lexie, but she was nearly twice as warm. Soon...

142111111121.content:
Your anger for the giant Raichu dimmed quite quickly after she began to tell her story. In fact, you felt sorry for her, and regretted being mad in the first place. Sure, what she did was mean. But she had been going through some rough stuff. It was easy to sympathize with someone like that. You and Veronica continued discussion for quite a while, trading life tales. You told her about how you met Lexie and that you aren't quite sure where you are, much to Veronica's sympathetic response. You realized that now that she had someone to talk to, she didn't have to bully around to vent her feelings.

It was getting late by the time the conversation dimmed down. It didn't take long for you to grow close. Suddenly, she spoke up, her bright eyes staring sweetly at you. "You know, I'm really sorry about earlier..." You stopped her before she could continue. "I understand completely. You don't need to worry about it!" Veronica gave a smile that was cuter than Lexie could have given, melting your heart. She turned her head a little, not looking you straight in the eye. "Do you consider us...y'know, friends?" It seemed like an odd question, but there was no way you could say no to that, especially given the circumstances.

"I don't see why not. You're a really nice person, Veronica, and I only wish I had known you, along with that fact, sooner." Her eyes sparkled with upcoming tears, and to hide them, she pulled you into a loving embrace. You stood there, between her fuzzy arms and soft belly, stupefied at first. It was then that you returned the hug as best you could, wrapping your tiny arms around the width of hers. She noticed your attempt and thought it was cute, giving you a sweet smile from above.

Just then, you heard light footsteps from below, though they seemed like stomps. You awakened from your pseudo-slumber as did Veronica. A voice cried out. "Veronica! Give him back now!" The mighty Raichu leaned over into a cross-legged sit, looming over the source of the voice. "Lexie? I didn't think you'd find me here..." You could see her faintly in the darkness, and she didn't look happy.

"That's not cool, Veronica. Just because you're bigger than me doesn't mean you can take my boyfriend!" You decide to intervene before anything can happen. "It's okay Lexie! It was all a big misunderstanding, it's alright!" You have to shout to allow her to hear you. "You're alright, then? What happened?" You and Veronica both hastily gave her a very brief and very general synopsis, avoiding the major details purposefully.

"Well, it's good to know that everything's alright. It's pretty late everyone, what do you say we get going to bed?" You both nodded in agreement. Veronica decided to come back with you and Lexie to spend the night.

"Well, you're right... I find you adorable. But to love another creature would be wrong and I simply can't do it..." A moment passed silently. "You can't love me?" Lexie asked, depressingly. I don't need you to love me. But you're good for other things, too!" "...Like?" You were somewhat afraid of what her answer would be. "Well..." Lexie started, "like this!"

Lexie stood up again. Now you were directly under her bottom, staring up at the gaping hole at her tail's base. "If you can't give me the pleasure of love... you can at least pleasure me in other ways." Lexie sat her massive backside down on you. Your fears of being crushed were unwarranted. You went straight up into the hole you'd been gazing at, and were now in the dark, wet confines of Lexie's ass. The smell was rank, yet oddly arousing. Her voice rumbled the walls of the chamber as she said, "This feels wonderful! If you would be so kind, please move around as much as you want in there."

You were guilty for rejecting her earlier, and felt obligated to obey. You began to rub the walls of her anus, taking in the scents and tastes (you licked the walls out of curiosity) as best as you could. "Better get used to it," you heard her say. "This is your home now." And so it was. You spent the rest of your natural life cooped up in her behind, pleasuring her to the best of your abilities. You didn't mind; it was as much a turn-on for her as it was for you.

1422322.content:
You try to struggle, but the yellow paw pinning you down keeps you still. Each movement you make hurts. After a while you finally give up.
"You finally gave up, uh? I was just thinking I'd have to stomp on you to stop you. Now little guy, if you don't want things to get rough, I suggest you start worshipping my foot." The Pikachu says.

Not wanting to be punished (and possibly killed), you decide to do as commanded and start rubbing the yellow sole of her foot, while the Pichu and the Raichu watch you, smirking.

You rub the Pikachu's foot until your arms are sore, in which point she switches foot. You repeat the same procedure for a while.

Then, the Pikachu finally lifts her foot, giving you air.
"Good job, slave. A really good job." she compliments you.

But, before you can move, another paw, dark brown and orange colored, steps on you, making you grit your teeth in pain.
"My turn if you don't mind." the Raichu girl says.

Understanding what she means, you start rubbing her feet as well. The smell is horrible. It smells like cheese mixed with sweat and dirt. You try hard to hold in your breath while you rub.

After a while, the Raichu gives you a hard stomp, before finally lifts her foot off and turns to the Pichu, who was watching the scene from a distant rock she is sitting on.
"Hey sis, why don't you get your own feet rubbing?" Raichu asks, smirking.
"Hm, why?" the Pichu asks.
"Aw come on, you can get pleasure without having to do anything!" the Raichu girl encourages her.

The Pichu gives a deep sigh, before standing up and walking over you. She puts her paw on you, though she's far more gentle than her sisters. Her foot actually smells really nice, so you start rubbing.

Several hours, and 'games' (which involved you sniffing/licking/rubbing the feet of the three pokemon), you are exhausted, and the sun settled down. The three pokemon decided to eat before going to sleep.

Amazed by the huge amount of food they managed to get in the forest, you sit down while Pikachu hands you a small slice of a berry.
"Eat up little guy, you'll need that." she states.
You eat silently.

You finish almost immediately your meal. You wait for the three pokemon to be full enough to declare their bedtime. The Raichu picks you and lifts you on a tree branch.
"So you won't have weird ideas," she says, before laying down with her sisters.

You try to get some sleep, but you can't. You're too hungry to sleep, and your stomach growls loudly, asking to be filled. Rubbing it, you notice something approaching.

You stare confused at the Pichu climbing on the tree branch.
"Hey there. Are you alright?" she asks in a somewhat concerned voice. You nod.
"That's good. Here, I brought you this, eat up." she whispers, handing you a berry.

She patiently waits for you to finish up the berry. You give a satisfied sigh, while she sits down next to you.
"Hey... Ehm... I'm sorry about today. You know, I didn't want my sisters making fun of me. I don't even know why they do treat you like a slave. I mean, you find something that little and cute and you make a slave out of it? Please." she says, somewhat annoyed, before continuing.
"I really was the one worried about your well being when we found you fainted. I tried to convince them that you needed help, but they didn't listen to me" she shakes her head.
"Please forgive them. They're not that mean."

"I do, but, why are you doing this?" you ask.
"Told you, I'm not like them, I'm more gentle. I also find you pretty cute..." she admits, blushing, and making you blush as well.

After a minute of awkward silence, Pichu speaks up again.
"Soooo... Want me to bring you back down? You might fall." she says.
"Thanks, but what if your sisters find me down?"
"I'll handle it. Come on now." Pichu picks you and carefully climbs down the tree. A gust of chilly wind passes, making you shiver.
Pichu notices.
"Hey, what's up?" she asks.
"It's... It's cold tonight..." you say.

Pichu's face lits up with a smile.
"Then, I know just the thing to make you warm." she says, before laying down on the ground. And she closes you in a hug, her soft and warm fur cushioning you.

As much embarrassing it can be, you have to admit that you feel instantly warm and cozy.

You yawn drowsily.
"Good night little one. Sleep tight," Pichu says.

Within minutes, you're asleep, comfortably snuggling to Pichu. She makes sure that you're really asleep, before smiling. She pecks your cheek, then she relaxes and falls asleep too.
